column3: $In attendance: Commissioner Landis, Christy Mathewson, Mayor Hylan, Gov. Silzer and Sen. Edwards of New Jersey, John Heydler (NL pres.), John Tener (former NL pres.) Hylan threw out the first ball; Landis presented diamond rings to all the NY players, trophies of their world's championship victory of last October.  Ump McCormick was presented with a diamond-studded watch fob (he was one of the officials of the last World's Series). The Polo Grounds was still in the throes of construction. The upper grandstands were still unfinished and the old flag pole was missing, prompting the Giants to raise the flag atop a temporary staff on the roof directly behind home plate.FILENAME_TX"
pbp account ends here, rest deduced1923NY1.EVN.regular.comment.csv"

NYTEM: O'Neil was displeased with the decision, threw his mask, and kicked up a lot of dust at home plate. Umpire Hart threw him out of the game and was surrounded by a bunch of howling, wrangling Braves. The Bostons apparently take their baseball seriously this season. Marquard was also ejected by Hart, along with O'Neil.1923NY1.EVN.regular.comment.csv"

When the Braves took the field, Mgr Mitchell proceeded to argue with Ump Hart, who had made several questionable decisions against the Braves.  Mitchell was ejected.1923NY1.EVN.regular.comment.csv"

Ump Klem ejected Carey and McKechnie at the start of the 9th following an argument which started during Carey's last AB.1923NY1.EVN.regular.comment.csv"

With Jackson up, Osborne committed a half-balk which Ump Westervelt admitted he did not see. The Giants protested and Ump Hart, standing behind Osborne, reversed the call.  A big argument ensued and Mgr Killefer was ejected.1923NY1.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
$Game called due to rain1923NY1.EVN.regular.comment.csv"

$High infield fly dropped safely a few feet from the pitcher's box.  Berg called for it but a sharp breeze carried it toward the plate and fell for a hit.  Kelly was caught between 2B & 3B, but Johnston muffed McCarren's throw.1923NY1.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
